oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1954 - Minnie Pearl performance - WSM
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Excerpts from a Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from 1954. Featuring Grant Turner and Gene Autry (announcer), Minnie Pearl, and Rod Brasfield on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Gene Autry; Rod Brasfield
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Gene Autry (incomplete) -- Gene Autry talks -- Gene Autry introduces Minnie Pearl and Rod Brasfield -- Opening theme -- Minnie Pearl talks -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Gene Autry, and Rod Brasfield) -- Closing theme -- Grant Turner talks
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Grand ole opry (Radio program); Turner, Grant; Autry, Gene, 1907-1998; Minnie Pearl; Cannon, Sarah Ophelia, 1912-1996; Brasfield, Rod, 1910-1958;
